.. _Soil_moisture_states:

Soil moisture states
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. option:: SoilstorePavedState

	:Requirement:
		Required
	:Description:
		For maximum values, see the used soil code in SUEWS_Soil.txt
	:Configuration:
		to fill


.. option:: SoilstoreBldgsState

	:Requirement:
		Required
	:Description:
		For maximum values, see the used soil code in SUEWS_Soil.txt
	:Configuration:
		to fill


.. option:: SoilstoreEveTrState

	:Requirement:
		Required
	:Description:
		For maximum values, see the used soil code in SUEWS_Soil.txt
	:Configuration:
		to fill


.. option:: SoilstoreDecTrState

	:Requirement:
		Required
	:Description:
		For maximum values, see the used soil code in SUEWS_Soil.txt
	:Configuration:
		to fill


.. option:: SoilstoreGrassState

	:Requirement:
		Required
	:Description:
		For maximum values, see the used soil code in SUEWS_Soil.txt
	:Configuration:
		to fill


.. option:: SoilstoreBSoilState

	:Requirement:
		Required
	:Description:
		For maximum values, see the used soil code in SUEWS_Soil.txt
	:Configuration:
		to fill
